abstract: If Apple can stop distribution of games that have offensive content, can it also reject applications that express political or social opinions it doesn’t agree with?
snippet: If Apple can stop distribution of games that have offensive content, can it also reject applications that express political or social opinions it doesn’t agree with?
lead_paragraph: Update | 5:16 p.m. Reaction from Apple and additional thoughts about South Park added at the end.

headline.main: In Defense of Baby Shaking on the iPhone
